definitions.definition: A mixture of other substances or things.
definitions.example: Scientists found a cocktail of pollutants in the river downstream from the chemical factory.

definitions.definition: A horse, not of pure breed, but having only one eighth or one sixteenth impure blood in its veins.
A mean, half-hearted fellow; a coward.
A species of rove beetle, so called from its habit of elevating the tail.
To adulterate (fuel, etc.) by mixing in other substances.

definitions.example: He dined and cocktailed her at the most exclusive bars and restaurants.
